review: Vocal intro very cool. A Trekker MUST HAVE
author: Nick Ott

review: Works great but I was very disappointed it would not work in hotel rooms because they have it blocked, I purchased a wireless router and still would not work.  I wish I saw that someone mention this before I purchased because I was traveling for 3 weeks and had to resort to watching Netflix on my laptop.
author: videofile

review: Enjoying this little device to the maximum. What's was good as this device, if not better, was the timely manner in which I received it.
author: Felix Sanchez-Carrera

review: Though it worked well for Netflix, I was very disappointed to learn, too late, that it doesn't work with Amazon Prime.
author: N. Hopkins
